title: Coyotes CEO Gutierrez Arrived Just in Time
itunes:title: Coyotes CEO Gutierrez Arrived Just in Time
description:
A hockey fan since his Harvard days, Xavier Gutierrez never expected to run a team. But here he is, recently relocated from a career in the investment world in Southern California, overseeing a franchise on the rise in one of America's fastest growing -- and most diverse -- cities. The first Latino to head an NHL team, he spoke to Jason Kelly, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch about the responsibility that entails, and the power of sports in building a fair and inclusive community.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
